contents.text: Thank you for calling HoneyBook in San Francisco, where we help you book your ideal clients faster, more frequently, and with less legwork.
To discover how to book your ideal clients faster with HoneyBook, press 1.
To learn about our automated proposals and contracts, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a HoneyBook sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Learn how HoneyBook's automated proposals and contracts can speed up booking clients
Walk me through setting up and customizing automated proposals and contracts for my veteran-owned consulting business.
I want to set up automated proposal and contract generation workflows via HoneyBook’s API.
I need help understanding how to use automated proposals and contracts.
Understand how HoneyBook's automated proposal and contract tools can help me book clients faster.

contents.text: To explore our subscription plans and pricing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Review HoneyBook subscription plans and pricing to select the best option
Help me compare subscription plans and pricing so I can choose the best HoneyBook plan for my post-military startup.
I’d like a detailed breakdown of HoneyBook subscription tiers, pricing models, and volume discounts.
I'd like someone to explain your subscription plans and pricing.
Explore HoneyBook subscription levels and pricing to choose the right plan for my tutoring side business.

contents.text: For help with your HoneyBook account or billing, press 2.
For account setup and technical assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team.

navigationGoals: Set up my HoneyBook account and resolve any technical issues
I need assistance troubleshooting login issues and completing my account setup for my small business.
I need technical assistance configuring my HoneyBook account, integrations, and user permissions.
I need assistance setting up my account and troubleshooting technical issues.
Get help setting up my HoneyBook account and configuring it for my workflow.

contents.text: For questions about billing and invoices, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing team.

navigationGoals: Clarify my HoneyBook billing charges and get invoice details
Clarify the recent billing charges and invoice payment options for my HoneyBook account.
I want to review my billing history, invoice line items, and charge classifications.
I have questions about my billing and need help with my invoice.
Inquire about a recent invoice and billing charges on my HoneyBook account.
